name: getPhoneNumberDetails
description:
A Zoom account owner or admin can purchase phone numbers and assign them to Zoom phone users. Use this API to get details on a specific Phone number in a Zoom account.

**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or higher plan with Zoom phone license
**Scope:** `phone:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

numberId.description: Unique Identifier of the Phone Number. This can be retrieved from the List Phone Numbers API.

$ul: **id**: Unique Identifier of the user to whom the number has been assigned.
**name**: Name of the user to whom the number has been assigned.
**type**: Indicates who the phone number belongs to.
**capability**: The capability for the phone number, whether it can take incoming calls, make outgoing calls, or both. Values include `incoming`, `outgoing`, or both of these values.
**display_name**: The display name for the phone number.
**id**: Unique Identifier of the Phone Number.
**location**: Location (city, state and country) where the Phone number is assigned.
**number_type**: The type of number. Values can be one of the following:

**id**: Target [site](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020809672-Managing-Multiple-Sites) in which the phone number was assigned. Sites allow you to organize the phone users in your organization. For example, you sites could be created based on different office locations.
**name**: Name of the site where the phone number is assigned.
